graph_title: Surface des zones forestières, en proportion de la surface terrestre
indicator_name: Surface des zones forestières, en proportion de la surface terrestre
SDG_GOAL: Goal 15: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
SDG_TARGET: Target 15.1: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 15.1.1: Forest area as a proportion of total land area
STAT_CONC_DEF: Forest area as a proportion of total land area
